abstract.t: DVMRP is an Internet routing protocol that provides an efficientmechanism for connection-less datagram delivery to a group of hostsacross an internetwork. It is a distributed protocol that dynamicallygenerates IP Multicast delivery trees using a technique calledReverse Path Multicasting (RPM) [Deer90]. This document is an updateto Version 1 of the protocol specified in RFC 1075 [Wait88].
